attributes.comment:
We desperately want to adopt, to rescue orphans and bring them into a family...
We have tried already and in the process had to file the I-600A and get
fingerprints TWICE!!!
The $7000 we spent to get documents with the State Seal and translation etc. and
delivered over a several three year period was all lost.
We want to try again, but income regulations in the US (not the country we want
to adopt from) are preventing this and now increasing the fee which many
adoptive parents must pay 2 TIMES OVER while waiting for their adoption to go
through is TOO MUCH.... Please reconsider how this will effect those who long to
sacrifice so they can care for needy children in this world... DO NOT MAKE IT
MORE DIFFICULT, IT IS DIFFICULT ENOUGH ALREADY WHEN DOCUMENTS EXPIRE AND MUST BE
PAID FOR 2 AND 3 TIMES OVER!!!
Please reconsider!

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Patricia M. Lueken
